meanings.sent1: Benjamin is a popular name for boys.
meanings.sent3: When Benjamin walked into the room, everyone smiled.
meanings.sent4: His presence was like a ray of sunshine, just like Benjamin.
meanings.sent5: The name Benjamin reminds me of kindness and strength.

meanings.sent1: I found a Benjamin in my wallet.
meanings.sent2: She tipped the waiter with a Benjamin.
meanings.sent3: I wish all my bills were as valuable as Benjamin.
meanings.sent4: His hard work paid off, and he held a Benjamin in his hand.
meanings.sent5: The crisp Benjamin felt like a small fortune in his pocket.
